thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Friday, 19 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-India's Wipro Dec Qtr Consol Profit Down About 8.5 Pct

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-India's Wipro Dec Qtr Consol Profit Down About 8.5 Pct
text:
Jan 19 (Reuters) - Wipro Ltd:
* DEC QUARTER CONSOL NET PROFIT 19.31 BILLION RUPEES VERSUS 21.10 BILLION RUPEES LAST YEAR
* CONSENSUS FORECAST FOR DEC QUARTER CONSOL NET PROFIT WAS 21.58 BILLION RUPEES
* DEC QUARTER CONSOL REVENUE FROM OPERATIONS 136.69 BILLION RUPEES VERSUS 136.88 BILLION RUPEES LAST YEAR
* APPROVED INTERIM DIVIDEND OF 1 RUPEE PER SHARE * DEC QUARTER CONSOL IT SERVICES SEGMENT REVENUE 132.35 BILLION RUPEES VERSUS 131.96 BILLION RUPEES LAST YEAR Source text - bit.ly/2EVjdf2 Further company coverage:
